diseases.disease: Hair issues / lice / poor scalp condition
diseases.method: Massage raw honey or oils into scalp; henna applications for scalp health and headache relief
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — honey and henna uses
diseases.remedy_description: Combination treatments often use raw honey (viscous golden syrup), natural oils (varied colors and textures), and henna powder (greenish-brown) for hair care. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Honey
